0: AN ACT RATIONALIZING THE MANAGEMENT OF NATURAL RESOURCES IN THE CAMOTES ISLANDS, PROVINCE OF CEBU, DECLARING CERTAIN LANDS OF THE PUBLIC DOMAIN AS AGRICULTURAL LAND OPEN TO DISPOSITION FOR AGRICULTURAL COMMERCIAL, RESIDENTIAL, INDUSTRIAL AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES, AMENDING FOR THE PURPOSE PROCLAMATION NO. 2152 DATED DECEMBER 29, 1981, ENTITLED "DECLARING THE ENTIRE PROVINCE OF PALAWAN AND CERTAIN PARCELS OF THE PUBLIC DOMAIN AND/OR PARTS OF THE COUNTRY AS MANGROVE SWAMP FOREST RESERVES"
